arm_group.description: 3 Fish meals per week for 4 months

brief_summary.textblock:
In the FINS study we test - in a randomized non blinded intervention study- the hypothesis
      that increased intake of herring and mackerel will improve cognitive performance of children
      aged 4 years to 5 years 8 months in the Munich area (Germany), who habitually consume little
      fish.

clinical_study.brief_title: Herring and Mackerel Intervention and Learning Abilities

detailed_description.textblock:
Long chain polyunsaturated fatty acids (LC-PUFA) of the n-3 series, eicosapentaenoic acid
      (EPA) and most prominently docosahexaenoic acid (DHA), are considered important for neural
      development during pre- and postnatal development.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  4-6 years

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  severe illness

          -  child dislikes fish
